scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:scss && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:images && npm run build:js && npm run build:json
scripts.build:watch: npm run httpserver & concurrently -p "{time} {name}" --names "HTML,SCSS,JS,JSON,SERVER" -c "magenta.bgBlack,green.bgBlack,yellow.bgBlack,cyan.bgBlack" "npm run build:html:watch" "npm run build:scss:watch" "npm run build:js:watch" "npm run build:json:watch"
scripts.build:scss: node-sass src/styles/snapgram.scss --output-style compressed --source-map-embed true --source-map-contents true | postcss --use autoprefixer --map -o dist/bundle.css
scripts.build:js: browserify src/app/index.js -t [ babelify ] -d | uglifyjs -c -m --source-map content=inline,url=inline | exorcist dist/bundle.js.map > dist/bundle.js
